content:
Here is the cleaned up text:

Einstein Replies
Einstein Service Replies
Einstein Service Replies for Chat
Set Up Service Cloud Basics

You are here: Salesforce Help > Docs > Service Cloud > Service Replies for Chat in the Console

Replies appear in the Einstein Replies component of the Chat and Messaging tab in the Lightning Service Console. Einstein recommends replies when your customer sends the first message in a chat or messaging session.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

To view and act on Einstein Service Replies: Service Replies User permission set

The recommendations are refreshed each time the customer sends a message. You donâ€™t need to click the chat window to refresh the recommendations.

Einstein recommends replies based on conversation context or knowledge grounding. Chat replies grounded in your knowledge base are shown first. To see whether replies come from conversation context or knowledge grounding, check below each reply in the recommendations component.

Agents can view replies grounded in knowledge only if both knowledge and grounding are set up. Learn more about grounding in Salesforce Help.

When working with multiple chats, click the top-right icon to dock the Einstein Replies component in the corner of the console.

Service Cloud Channels is available in English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, and Spanish.

To use grounded replies in multiple languages you need at least one knowledge article in the language you want to use. For replies based on the conversation context, Einstein detects the language and drafts replies accordingly.
title: Einstein Service Replies for Chat Setup and Usage
